ValidationRule.description:
per case 23326147
On Recordtype: 401k Incoming Checks and ACHs - If 'Research Resolution Date' is entered, then 'Returned-No Trade' OR 'Ready for Trade' need to be entered before the object can be saved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = "401k Incoming Checks and ACHs"&& !ISNULL(Research_Resolution_Date__c)&& ISNULL( Returned_No_Trade__c)&& ISNULL( Ready_for_Trade__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If 'Research Resolution Date' is entered, then 'Returned-No Trade' OR 'Ready for Trade' need to be entered before the object can be saved.
